mapper.select: select review_day_no, title, day_date, day_review, main_photo, status from review_days where review_no=#{no} order by review_day_no asc

select d.review_day_no, d.title, d.day_date, d.day_review, d.main_photo, d.status, r.review_no, p.review_place_no from review_days d inner join reviews r on d.review_no=r.review_no left outer join review_place p on d.review_day_no=p.review_day_no where d.review_day_no=#{no}
select review_day_no, title, day_date, day_review, main_photo, status from review_days where review_no

select u.user_no, r.review_no, r.create_date, r.status, d.review_day_no, d.title, d.day_date, d.day_review, d.main_photo, d.status, p.review_place_no, p.place_name, p.place_basic_address, p.place_detail_address, p.place_review, p.main_photo, p.status, t.photo_no, t.photo_file from reviews r inner join users u on r.user_no=u.user_no inner join review_days d on r.review_no=d.review_no inner join review_place p on d.review_day_no=p.review_day_no inner join review_place_photo t on p.review_place_no=t.review_place_no where d.review_day_no=#{no}
